Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 185th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Charles Barney (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2015, off John Suits (BOS)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Injured on 5/26/2017 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Brooklyn on 6/26/2017...
Injured on 7/20/2017 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2017, hitting .392 with 3 HR, 26 RBI...
Injured on 6/1/2019 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
10/23/2019: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (B), $3,500,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/2/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $1,955,000 per year...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Atlanta on 4/21/2021 (Going to SLB: P Valeriano Navarro. Going to ATL: 1B Joseph Hepp)...
Released by Atlanta on 8/4/2021...
